settings.name: startDelay
settings.description: The start delay (ex. 1m, 1h, etc.), immediate if not specified

settings.name: repeatInterval
settings.description: The repeat interval (ex. 1m, 1h, etc.), doesn't repeat if not specified

settings.name: rootFolder
settings.description: The root folder where trigger searches for files. eg. /tmp/STEP/LOCATION

settings.name: filePattern
settings.description: The complete file pattern (including root folder, wildcards are supported). eg /tmp/STEP/LOCATION/????????-*/*.txt
